original_text: And he will stretch out his hand against the north, and destroy Assyria; and will make Nineveh a desolation, and dry like a wilderness.
korean_text: 여호와가 북쪽을 향하여 손을 펴서 앗수르를 멸하며 니느웨를 황폐하게 하여 사막 같이 메마르게 하리니

sentences.original_text: And he will stretch out his hand against the north
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 북쪽을 향해 손을 뻗을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and will make Nineveh a desolation
